name: Demon Hunter (itch)
description:
The page for my game for 7DRL challenge 2018.
Controls: click to select or use the arrows to navigate and press enter

1-4: select skill( don't go over the num of skills you have, 0 is move)

I'm going to remove a late feature that caused lot of bugs and did't work, nothing more, just less things ^^

the game is very bugged, and still lack of content, but is playable for the first level only
